DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this protocol is to enable collection of biospecimens to facilitate current and future multidisciplinary research in rare genetic disorders and medical conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Collection and Storage of Human Biospecimens for Research Into Rare Diseases and Medical Conditions
DOC.criteria: Willing and able to provide written, signed informed consent Willing and able to comply with all study procedures Use of any investigational product or investigational medical device within 30 days prior to screening, except as part of a BioMarinsponsored study Concurrent disease or condition that would interfere with study participation or safety.
